note:
Gen Xer who loves anime, manga, especially SciFi, Fantasy & RomComs; sort of a Benjamin Button type of anime fan...really got into anime past the "otaku expiration date" and still going strong this many years later.

IRL, my day job, I'm an Interlibrary Loan librarian. My job title says Paraprofessional but I have an ALA accredited MLS so I'm a underemployed *librarian*.

I was diagnosed ASD at age 39 in 2010 and it makes the past make a lot more sense; I continue to grow and evolve in my understanding of my autistic self and relating to other neurodiverse folks.

I'm a middle aged guy, divorced, boring CIS-Het but try to be a good ally.

fields.name: Politics
fields.value: Democratic Socialist (I'm a Lefty.  Bernie primary voter but back the DP nominee because ZOMG we must stop Fascism!)

fields.name: Enthusiasms
fields.value: Anime, manga, foreign languages & linguistics generally
